text: Awesome thanks! In your opinion, what would be the best way to create a "Add to calendar button" in HubSpot CMS Hub in the meantime?

I would check which calendar types you are looking to create for (Google, Outlook, Apple, etc) and then find out what the syntax would be for those. This stackoverflow seems to have some of the syntaxs available: <https://stackoverflow.com/questions/5831877/how-do-i-create-a-link-to-add-an-entry-to-a-calendar>
